actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT `OID`,
    `CUSTOMER_OID`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE1`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE2`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_CITY`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_DISTRICT`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_STATE`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_COUNTRY`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_ZIP`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOBILE`,
    `CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_EMAIL`,
		 `CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE`,
    `CREATE_USER_OID`,
    `CREATE_DATE_TIME`,
    `LAST_UPDATE_USER_OID`,
    `LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME`,
    `LOCK_SESSION_OID`,
    `LOCK_DATE_TIME`
FROM APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS where CUSTOMER_OID ='{{appsmith.store.customerOID}}' AND CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE IS NOT NULL ;
